title: minerjones
author: minerjones
created_time: September 20, 2022, 11:06:32 AMLast edit: September 25, 2022, 01:24:10 AM by minerjones
content: 4 fun collectibles up for grabs:LOT 1: 2019 Utah Goldbacks set (50,25,10,5,1) + 2020 Nevada "1" GoldbackLOT 2: Corrosive Creations 4 of Spades silver card + COALOT 3: Corrosive Creations 7 of Spades silver card + COALOT 4: Bitcoin Poker 2020 Set #1 + COASTARTING BID LOT 1: 0.0180BTCSTARTING BID LOT 2 AND LOT 3: 0.0026BTCSTARTING BID LOT 4: 0.0050BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT PER ITEM: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: SEPTEMBER 25th, 2022, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOTIf within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made PER LOT, 5 minutes will be added to the that lot from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference

comments.author: cygan
comments.body: these poker chips are new to me and i did not know them until now is there more information about them (manufacturer, website, minting, etc.)

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Quote from: cygan on September 20, 2022, 11:28:54 AMthese poker chips are new to me and i did not know them until now is there more information about them (manufacturer, website, minting, etc.) they are Mantis poker chips (look at the holos closely) - I went to pull the thread where I got my set in 2020 but the threads posts have been deleted and the thread archived.

comments.author: minerjones
comments.created_time: September 20, 2022, 01:54:22 PMLast edit: September 25, 2022, 02:24:02 PM by minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on September 20, 2022, 12:20:51 PMQuote from: cygan on September 20, 2022, 11:28:54 AMthese poker chips are new to me and i did not know them until now is there more information about them (manufacturer, website, minting, etc.) they are Mantis poker chips (look at the holos closely) - I went to pull the thread where I got my set in 2020 but the threads posts have been deleted and the thread archived.These were a run of 2100 chips that were produced in October 2020.All 2100 chips were funded in one transaction directly from redeemed BTCC items... so 1-hop virgins There were 5-full poker sets complete with golden Bitcoin playing cards and the rest were 9-chip sets and some extra singles as seen in the picture below:
